roleset.name: tolerate, put up with

example.name: they pretty much all look like this
example.text: Even with mutual funds, [the little investor]-1 continues *trace*-1 to tolerate high fees, high commissions and poor performance, while index-fund managers slowly amass a better record with lower fees, lower commissions and less risk.
example.arg: high fees , high commissions and poor performance

example.name: adjectival rel: tolerant
example.text: My eldest who-1 [*-1] is especially friendly and tolerant tried to make friends with these people but in the end they all wanted something .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'tolerate' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'tolerant' based on BOLT-2,3; adjectival 'tolerated' based on medi-seedcorpus. Member of Vncls admire-31.2, allow-64.

example.name: adjectival rel: tolerated
example.text: The procedure was well tolerated without immediate complications .
